data.text: “Wobɛtumi de darewa atwe ɔdɛnkyɛmmirampɔn
Wobɛtumi de ahoma afa ne hwenemu,
Ɔbɛkɔ so asrɛ wo sɛ hunu no mmɔbɔ anaa?
Ɔbɛpene ne wo ayɛ apam
Wobɛtumi de no ayɛ ayɛmmoa te sɛ anomaa
Adwadifoɔ bɛpɛ sɛ wobɛtɔ no de no adi dwa anaa?
Wobɛtumi de mpea awowɔ ne wedeɛ mu
Wode wo nsa ka no a,
Ɛkwan biara nni hɔ a wobɛfa so akye no;
Obiara ntumi nsi ne bo nhwanyane no.
Hwan na mede no ka a ɛsɛ sɛ metua?
“Me werɛ remfiri sɛ mɛka nʼakwaa,
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aworɔ ne ho nwoma,
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi abue nʼapantan,
Nʼakyi wɔ abona a ɛsesa soɔ,
sɛdeɛ ɛpipi so fa no enti,
Ɛtoatoa mu dendeenden a
Sɛ ɔnwansi a, ɛtete ogya;
Egyatɛn turi firi nʼanom
Wisie tene firi ne hwene mu
Nʼahomeɛ ma gyabidie ano sɔ,
Ne kɔn mu wɔ ahoɔden ankasa;
Ne wedeɛ a abubu agu soɔ no yɛ peperee;
Ne koko so yɛ dene sɛ ɔbotan;
Sɛ ɔsɔre a, ahoɔdenfoɔ bɔ huboa;
Akofena wɔ no a, ɛnka no,
Ɔfa dadeɛ sɛ wira bi
Agyan mma no nnwane;
Aporibaa te sɛ ɛserɛ wɔ nʼani so;
Abon a ano yɛ nnam tuatua ne yafunu so.
Ɔma ebunu mu huru sɛ nsuo a ɛwɔ ɛsɛn mu
Deɛ ɔbɛfa no, ɛhɔ nsuo no pa yerɛyerɛ;
Biribiara a ɛwɔ asase so ne no nsɛ.
Ɔmmu wɔn a wɔyɛ ahantan no mu biara;
